mapper.select:
select ls.id, ls.pharmacy_id, ls.drug_id, ls.quantity, ls.storage_type, ls.create_date, ls.custodian, phi.name AS pharmacyName, phi.address, di.name AS drugName, di.brand, di.images, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages from inventory_statistics ls left join pharmacy_info phi on (phi.id = ls.pharmacy_id) left join drug_info di on (di.id = ls.drug_id) left join staff_info si on (si.code = ls.custodian) where 1 = 1
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inventoryStatistics.drugName},'%')
AND phi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inventoryStatistics.pharmacyName},'%')
order by ls.create_date desc
